plans.title: District 1 Food & Karaoke Adventure

phases.name: Hotpot Dinner at Pho 24
phases.description: Authentic Vietnamese hotpot experience with fresh ingredients and multiple soup bases
phases.address: 123 Nguyen Hue, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

phases.name: Karaoke at Golden Dragon
phases.description: Private karaoke rooms with great sound system and song selection
phases.address: 456 Le Loi, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

phases.name: Rooftop Bar at Saigon Sky
phases.description: Stunning city views with craft cocktails and live music
phases.address: 789 Dong Khoi, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

plans.fitAnalysis: Perfect for energetic team members who love karaoke and nightlife. The multi-phase approach allows for natural progression from dinner to entertainment.
plans.longTermStrategy: Rotate to chill theme next month to balance team preferences and give quieter members a chance to shine.

plans.title: Cafe Hopping & Chill Vibes

phases.name: Coffee & Chat at The Workshop
phases.description: Specialty coffee in a relaxed atmosphere with great conversation spaces
phases.address: 27 Ngo Duc Ke, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

phases.name: Dinner at Hum Vegetarian
phases.description: Delicious vegetarian Vietnamese cuisine in a peaceful setting
phases.address: 32 Vo Van Tan, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City

plans.fitAnalysis: Ideal for chill team members who prefer quiet, meaningful conversations and vegetarian-friendly options. The cafe-hopping concept appeals to Ben and Lil Thanh's preferences.
plans.longTermStrategy: Next month focus on outdoor activities to include nature lovers and provide variety for the team.

plans.title: Outdoor BBQ & Games

phases.name: BBQ at Saigon Outcast
phases.description: Outdoor BBQ with live music, games, and plenty of space for team activities
phases.address: 188/1 Nguyen Van Huong, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City

plans.fitAnalysis: Great for energetic members who enjoy outdoor activities and socializing. The BBQ format appeals to meat-lovers like Cody and Khang, while the outdoor setting provides fresh air and space for games.
plans.longTermStrategy: Consider indoor game night next month for variety and to accommodate different weather conditions.

plans.title: Gaming & Movie Night

phases.name: Board Games at The Board Game Cafe
phases.description: Wide selection of board games with food and drinks in a cozy atmosphere
phases.address: 15 Le Thanh Ton, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

phases.name: Movie Night at CGV Cinema
phases.description: Latest blockbuster movie with comfortable seating and snacks
phases.address: 65 Le Loi, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

plans.fitAnalysis: Perfect for team members who enjoy games and movies. This plan combines Mason's love for games with Huy's movie night preference, creating a balanced entertainment experience.
plans.longTermStrategy: This gaming theme can be rotated with more active outdoor events to maintain team engagement variety.

plans.title: Rooftop Dinner & Drinks

phases.name: Dinner at Chill Skybar
phases.description: Elegant rooftop dining with panoramic city views and international cuisine
phases.address: 76A Le Lai, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

plans.fitAnalysis: Appeals to Seven's rooftop bar preference and provides a sophisticated dining experience. However, the higher cost may require optional contributions from team members.
plans.longTermStrategy: Use this premium option sparingly, perhaps quarterly, to maintain budget balance while providing special experiences.
